name: Ritter Sport Peppermint Chocolate Bar
description: When slightly chilled, this bar of blended dark chocolate and tangy peppermint fondant is a refreshing treat on a hot day. The square-shaped German chocolate bar breaks into convenient bite-sized chunks so you can easily share it with friends.May contain traces of peanuts, nuts, gluten, milk and egg.Ingredients: sugar, cocoa mass, vegetable fat (palm, coconut), cocoa butter, glucose syrup, stabiliser (sorbitol syrup), butterfat, emulsifier (soya lecithins), peppermint oil.
